Message:
Suddenly, light poured from
my outstretched hand,
sending the creature flying!

I didn’t have time
to relax though.
The creature next
turned its ire on me,
and lunged forward.

I shut my eyes in horror,
when a mysterious
ray of light passed beside me!

“Thank you for protecting him.
He means the world to us...”

several witches, each one
draped in mystical light,
raced towards the creature!

What followed was
everything I’d ever imagined.

The witches—the heroes—
vanquishing the evildoer.
A tale as old as time.

...Except for the part
where no one thanked us.

They drove me and the
other witches out of town,
blaming us for
spreading calamity.

But, it’s alright—
I’m not lonely anymore.
I have friends now.

These witches aren’t quite
how I’d always imagined
they would be though.

No one fawns over them,
or even bothers to
thank them.
As a matter of fact,
it’s quite the opposite.

But, none of that
changes how I feel.

Witches are heroes.
If the people of the world
don’t see that yet,
I’ll make them!

...By becoming a true hero.
One who’ll save the world.
